channel.title: (Traffic Court) - For not going to school
channel.description:
[i]Well this is not for me & i really want to know the answer if i do come across this
What will happen if i don't show up for traffic court because of school?[/i]

item.title: (Traffic Court) - For not going to school
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“IceTICKER, post:1, topic:345513”][i]Well this is not for me & i really want to know the answer if i do come across this

What will happen if i don’t show up for traffic court because of school?[/i][/quote]Whoever the idiot is will server a greater penalty…? What more can you assume?

item.title: (Traffic Court) - For not going to school
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Umm, you can’t just “not show up”, or you (depending on your location) will get a suspended drivers license, and possibly, if the court wants to be a dick, get a few fines as well.

My suggestion to you: Call the court and see about another date, or at least a different time during the day.

Read full topic
